title: Option to remove opacity animation in ImageEx
body: I noticed this problem as soon as I adapted my app to use ImageEx.  I use an event to change opacity to 1 once the image is loaded and sized, and immediately I noticed that instead of just displaying, the image faded in with a 1-second animation.  This animation seems hard-coded into the style, so to get rid of it I would have to redefine the style.  A real pain just to get rid of the animation.
